description:
What in the world is the Amazing Spider-Man doing in Scotland?

Would you believe he's there on a second honeymoon with his beautiful wife, Mary Jane, when he discovers the castle she inherited is haunted? Upon investigating the local night life, New York's neurotic super hero nearly loses his life to a ghostly knight hell-bent on evicting the castle's new owners permanently. Things don't get any better when murderous members of Scotland's bizzare branch of the Hellfire Club turn up to greet the web-spinner.

This wild wondrous adventure is brilliantly brought to life by one of today's foremost fantasy illustrators, Charles Vess. Painstakingly painted over the course of two years, Charles has created a comic art masterpiece, sure to take your breath away.

Peter Parker was a shy high school student attending a science exhibit, when he was bitten by a radioactive spider which granted him the proportionate strength and speed of the arachnid, as well as a mysterious Spider-Sense that can alert him to all forms of danger. Devising a colorful costume and creating a powerful synthetic web-fluid, he became the reluctant super hero the world knows as the Amazing Spider-Man.

Today he attends college as a grad student, works as a photographer for the Daily Bugle, and is husband to actress/model Mary Jane Watson-Parker.

"Spirits of the Earth" removes the Amazing Spider-Man from his usual stomping grounds of New York City's mean streets and plunks him down in Soctland's beautiful countryside. Like a spider torn from his web, he must adapt to an environment where there are no tall buildings from which to swing and instead of earth-bound super-villains, he must face supernatural forces that defy scientific logic.

It all begins innocently enough, when returning home after dealing with a routine street crime he discovers that his wife has inherited a castle in Scotland. Hopping the next jet to Europe, our heroes embark on what will soon be their second haunted honeymoon.

Before the first night's over, Spidey encounters a homicidal ghost, angered townspeople, and members of the Hellfire Club. Then it gets worse.
name: OGN

volume.name: Marvel Graphic Novel: Conan of the Isles

description:
All of Attilan comes out to celebrate the upcoming wedding of Tally to Frag. On the eve of her wedding night, Tally commits suicide. The denizens of Attilan respond to Tally's death. Gorgon is dismayed at the populace's rejection of their culture's traditions. The aged Chief Justices of the Genetic Council prepare to issue more edicts. Crystal contemplates the proper usage of the Terrigan Mists. Gorgon argues for traditionalism against Karnak's more progressive beliefs. Triton intervenes in the conflict, only to suffer the harshest of words from Karnak. Medusa awaits her husband, the Inhuman King, Black Bolt. Medusa dismisses her handmaiden, Minxi, to reveal her pregnancy to Black Bolt.

At first, Black Bolt is angered at Medusa's defiance of the Genetic Council. Black Bolt, though, quickly warms to the notion of fatherhood. The Inhuman populace rails against the harshness of the Genetic Council's laws. To soothe her subjects, Medusa reveals her pregnancy. The Genetic Council is furious at Medusa's open defiance. Black Bolt's stock is deemed unfit to continue, and the pregnancy is ordered terminated. Black Bolt stands by the Genetic Council's decision. The Inhuman Royal Family attempts to console Medusa, to no avail. Medusa flees to Earth, to birth her baby. When the news reaches Black Bolt's insane brother, Maximus, the renegade Inhuman releases himself from prison.

Crystal's husband, Quicksilver, stands behind Black Bolt's decision. Crystal leaves their daughter, Luna, with their nanny. The Inhuman Royal Family argues over whether to support Medusa, or Black Bolt. Ultimately, they all decide to journey to Earth, to be by Medusa's side. Quicksilver informs Black Bolt of the Royal Family's abandonment. Medusa, with Minxi, hides out in the Nevada desert. Maximus sets his newest scheme into motion. Maximus holds his brother accountable, in the deaths of their parents, and the accident which drove Maximus insane. Black Bolt isolates himself from the Inhuman populace.

The Inhuman Royal Family arrives in Las Vegas. They immediately draw an angry mob against them, who mistake the Inhumans for Mutants. The Inhuman Royal family makes contact with a group of isolationists, who lead them to Medusa. As Earth's environment is toxic to the Inhumans, Crystal uses her powers to purify the area surrounding them. Gorgon protests this disruption in the natural world. Maximus makes contact with the isolationists. Karnak lauds Crystal's purification of their environment, Minxi, however, believes as Gorgon does. What Crystal has done is unnatural. Black Bolt suffers in silence. Triton notes, with dismay, the isolating nature of his aquatic physiology.

The natural world responds to Crystal's interference, birthing a creature composed of the four primordial elements. Medusa realizes that Karnak desires her handmaiden, Minxi. Gorgon throws in with the isolationists. Karnak confronts Gorgon, in search of Minxi. Gorgon also notes Karnak's desire for Minxi, a desire Gorgon shares. Maximus, in the guise of Black Bolt, appears to Medusa. Maximus is spurned. The Inhuman Royal Family begins to note strange occurrences in the environment. The Inhuman Royal Family is attacked by the monstrous spawn of the four elements. After a pitched battle, the Inhuman Royal family, working in unison, destroy the unnatural abomination.

Medusa goes into labor. Karnak fears the child will possess it's father's city-leveling voice. In a fit of hallucinogenic madness, Maximus murders the leader of the isolationists. Medusa gives birth to a son. Maximus feels remorse for his actions. Crystal feels guilt for taking action against the natural world. Karnak's attempt to court Minxi is interrupted by Gorgon. Minxi reveals her feelings for Gorgon. Medusa bonds with her son. The elemental creature resurrects itself. This time, the Inhuman Royal Family fares less well in their combat with the creature. Lockjaw teleports an injured Triton to the Royal Palace, in Attilan. The first cry of Medusa's son destroys the creature.

Medusa notes a change in the demeanor of her son. Maximus convinces Medusa to return to Attilan. Gorgon, and Karnak, come to an understanding. Black Bolt arrives on Earth. Black Bolt happily reunites with his family. The Inhuman Royal Family returns to Attilan. The Genetic Council takes possession of the baby. Karnak rails against the corruption within the Genetic Council. Quicksilver makes plans to reconcile with Crystal. Minxi notes the change in Medusa, since returning from Earth. Like Black Bolt, Medusa, too, has grown silent. Maximus returns to the Royal Prison, where he dreams of using the baby as a weapon against Black Bolt.
name: The Inhumans

volume.name: The Inhumans A Marvel Graphic Novel

The 3rd Hardcover from the Punisher Max series includes the "The Slavers" and "Barracuda" story arcs. The Slavers has Frank rescuing a girl from some European thugs. The story she tells him afterwards makes him very unhappy. The Punisher meets one of his deadliest foes in Barracuda. A trial of bodies, blood and even a couple fingers follow. Collects Punisher Max #25-36

description:
The fourth Hardcover book in the series collects the "Man of Stone" and "Widowmaker" arcs.  
 
In "Man of Stone" the Punisher travels to Afghanistan with an old friend. Yes he does have a couple. In "Widowmaker" the wives of past Punisher victims ban together to stop him. Collects Punisher Max #37-49.

description: This is the start of the final part of the the Ultimate Enemy trilogy. See the brutal confrontation between Sue Storm and Reed Richards as the Ultimate Universe is left reeling by his betrayal. Meanwhile Spider Woman is being held captive by the Roxxon Corporation and gets reacquainted with the man who created her. Featuring Rick Jones, Spider Man, The Human Torch and Nick Fury as well as others the final act of this series begins with a bang.
name: Part 1

description:
Who is Superior? Where did he come from? And who the hell is after him?!? MARK MILLAR (KICK-ASS, NEMESIS, CIVIL WAR) and LEINIL FRANCIS YU (SECRET INVASION, NEW AVENGERS) continue the non-stop excitement of their all-new super hero series. If you liked KICK-ASS and NEMESIS--do yourself the greatest favor you could ever do. Don't miss SUPERIOR!

Simon continues his new identity as Superior. He is now running around the world stopping disasters, and the news media finally gets wind of him. Plus a villian is revealed.

A highly skilled hunter, Angela has been ordered to stand trial for treason. Always considered an angel of honor and integrity, her friends disbelieve the charges and set about uncovering evidence to refute them.They recruit Spawn, and Earth-bound soldier of Hell whom Angela last hunted, to go before the judge. However, when Angela and Spawn last met, Angela was the hunter and Spawn her quarry; she the attacker and he on the defensive. They were an even match, neither able to best the other. Now, the tables are turned and Angela must ask her prey to defend her in a court where mercy is never an option. With her life at stake, can Angela trust and depend on the very enemy she tried to kill?
name: TPB

description: Lady Skye learns her destiny in this climactic issue! Skye, along with Braylon and the rest of their band, is caught in an epic battle with monsters from the realm of dreams.
name: A Good Death

description: Lady Skye comes upon a series of strange statues holding secret messages that could be from her dead father. She also meets Braylon, the powerful Green Knight, who recounts his woeful tale of how he came to be, along with the tragic fate of his wife.
name: Lost Incantation

description: Skye and Braylon are attacked by Glyph, a mercenary of ill repute, who becomes an unlikely ally in Skye's quest for her missing kin.
name: Choose Your Own Adventure

description: A dream foretells the future and mysteries of the past are revealed, including the secret of Skye's mother! Skye encounters a knight formerly in the service of her father and is attacked by an unlikely opponent, and the gods go to war!
name: Dreamers Keepers

description: Three days ago young Skye's world was suddenly pulled out from under her. After a vicious attack on her village she was bound, gagged and carried off into the forest by a mysterious wizard. Now she must regain her freedom in time to save her niece and nephew...before they find themselves in the belly of a magical beast!
name: A Different Wizard

description: Grimm Fairy Tales presents 'The Grateful Beasts.' Trapped in the Realm of Myst, Sela continues her journey through the strange Fairy Tale land filled with magical creatures, both friendly and deadly. When she meets the King of the Wolves, Sela finds herself in a predicament where her decisions will either earn her a powerful ally or will ultimately make her the Big Bad Wolf's dinner.
name: The Grateful Beasts

description:
It's the season to be jolly... the season to give and receive gifts. But not everyone is here to spread holiday cheer and not all the gifts received have been asked for. Beware of the gifts from Krampus which come with a price! This special issue features four all new short stories and introduces a brand new character to the Grimm Universe. Don't miss out on all the holiday fun. 
 
Note: Sela and Belinda appear only on the cover.
name: Coming To Town; Do You Hear What I Hear?; Christmas Future; The Pollyanna
